field.label: Enable
field.help: This will activate the OSPF service if routing protocols are enabled in "General".

field.label: CARP demote
field.help: Register CARP status monitor, when no neighbors are found, consider this node less attractive. This feature needs syslog enabled using "Debugging" logging to catch all relevant status events. This option is not compatible with "Enable CARP Failover".

field.label: Router ID
field.help: If you have a CARP setup, you may want to configure a router id in case of a conflict.

field.label: Reference Cost
field.help: Here you can adjust the reference cost in Mbps for path calculation. Mostly needed when you bundle interfaces to higher bandwidth.

field.label: Passive Interfaces
field.help: Select the interfaces, where no OSPF packets should be sent to.

field.label: Route Redistribution
field.help: Select other routing sources, which should be redistributed to the other nodes.
field.hint: Type or select a route source.

field.label: Redistribution Map
field.help: Route Map to set for Redistribution.

field.label: Advertise Default Gateway
field.help: This will send the information that we have a default gateway.

field.label: Always Advertise Default Gateway
field.help: This will send the information that we have a default gateway, regardless of if it is available.

field.label: Advertise Default Gateway Metric
field.help: This let you manipulate the metric when advertising default gateway.
